name: Dataflow example ml inference.
description: This example pipeline runs a model inference on a dataset using a trained model.

parameters.name: dataset_csv_path
parameters.label: Dataset CSV path
parameters.helpText: The path to the dataset CSV file. Must be a GCS path.

parameters.name: dataset_img_root
parameters.label: Dataset image root
parameters.helpText: The root path to the dataset images. Must be a GCS path.

parameters.name: model_checkpoint_path
parameters.label: Model checkpoint path
parameters.helpText: The path to the model checkpoint file. Must be a GCS path.

parameters.name: device
parameters.label: Device
parameters.helpText: The device to run the model on.

parameters.name: dataflow_service_option
parameters.label: Dataflow service option
parameters.helpText: The Dataflow service option to use.

parameters.name: disk_size_gb
parameters.label: Disk size GB
parameters.helpText: The disk size in GB to use.
